data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31.03.2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith the Audited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2023 along with Standalone Statement of Assets & Liabilities and Standalone Cash Flow Statement as at 31st March, 2023 alongwith the declaration by Mr. Udai Kothari, Chairman & Managing Director of the Company in accordance with the Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI(LODR) Regulations, 2015 with respect to the unmodified opinion of the Statutory Auditors on the Audited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2023.

data.caption: Statement Of Unaudited Standalone Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December, 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith the Statement of Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2022 as per Indian Accounting Standard (Ind- AS) which have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company in their meeting held today. i.e, 31st January, 2023 and also Limited Review Report furnished by the Statutory Auditors of the Company.The above Statement of Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2022 is also available on the website of the Company (www.uyfincorp.com), The BSE Limited (www.bseindia.com) and The Calcutta Stock Exchange Limited (www.cse-india.com). The results in the prescribed format will be published in the Newspapers pursuant to Regulation 47(1)(b) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: Statement Of Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Yearly Ended 30Th September, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith the Statement of Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and half yearly ended 30th September, 2022 as per Indian Accounting Standard (Ind- AS) which have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company in their meeting held today. i.e, 14th November, 2022 and also Limited Review Report furnished by the Statutory Auditors of the Company.
The above Statement o Financial Results for the quarter and half yearly ended 30th September, 2022 is also available on the website of the Company, The BSE Limited and The Calcutta Stock Exchange Limited. The results in the prescribed format will be published in the Newspapers pursuant to Regulation 47(1)(b) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.
The Meeting of the Board of Directors commenced on 2:00 P.M. and concluded on 05:50 P.M.

data.caption: Statement Of Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter And Three Months Ended 30Th June, 2022
data.news_body:
The Statement of Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and three months ended 30th June, 2022 as per Indian Accounting Standard (Ind- AS) which have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company in their meeting held today. i.e, 13th August, 2022 and also Limited Review Report furnished by the Statutory Auditors of the Company.
The above Statement of Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and three months ended 30th June, 2022 is also available on the website of the Company (www.uyfincorp.com), The BSE Limited (www.bseindia.com) and The Calcutta Stock Exchange Limited (www.cse-india.com).
The results in the prescribed format will be published in the Newspapers pursuant to Regulation 47(1)(b) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
The Meeting of the Board of Directors commenced on 3:00 P.M. and concluded on 4:15 P.M.

data.caption: Corrigendum To The Statement Of Standalone And Consolidated Annual Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2022 Submitted On 30.05.2022
data.news_body:
With reference to the Standalone and Consolidated Annual Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022 filed with the Stock Exchanges on May 30, 2022, we wish to present this Corrigendum due to wrongly attachment of last two pages of the PDF file w.r.t. Consolidated Financial Results. However the XBRL submitted w.r.t the aforesaid results is correct.

There are no other corrections to the Statement of Standalone and Consolidated Annual Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022 filed with the Stock Exchanges on May 30, 2022.

Kindly take this corrigendum on records and kindly replace attached PDF file with the pervious file on your records.

data.caption: AFR As On 31.03.2022
data.news_body:
1. Audited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2022 along with Standalone Statement of Assets & Liabilities and Standalone Cash Flow Statement as at 31st March, 2022.
2. Audited Consolidated Financial Results for the year ended 31st March, 2022 along with Consolidated Statement of Assets & Liabilities and Consolidated Cash Flow Statement as at 31st March, 2022.
3. Auditor's Report on the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2022 alongwith the declaration by Mr. Udai Kothari, Chairman & Managing Director of the Company in accordance with the Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI(LODR) Regulations, 2015 with respect to the unmodified opinion of the Statutory Auditors on the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2022.
